string-array.name: updates
string-array.item: v2.3.14: Add Slovak translation, fix czech tanslation
v2.3.13: Add chinese translation, set custom locale
v2.3.12: Add turkish translation, support for Samsung Galaxy GT-I5500
v2.3.9: Support any other device, fix some FC
v2.3.8: Support Samsung Galxy S GT-I9000
v2.3.7: Add italian and norwegian translation
v2.3.5: New icon, new billing modes 6/6,30/60 and 60/6, fix some bugs

v2.3: Fix counting incoming calls, change separator, show contacts name in excluded numbers, allow *555* wildcards, allow to exclude numbers for sms, allow to set separate billing period for data plan, allow to reset traffic stats, add cost to traffic stats, show progressbar for billing cycle, fix some more bugs
v2.2: Allow to bill incoming calls/messages across two plans, minor changes to gui
v2.1: Allow to set cost for calls/messages, allow to bill incoming traffic only, set excluded numbers from contacts
v2.0: Run callmeter every 30min in background to save logs, add 60/30 billing mode, allow to bill inbound calls/messages, change donator check
